name: Grauzone Festival

config_properties.name: Grauzone Festival
config_properties.description: A post-punk and darkwave festival in The Hague, Netherlands, featuring underground and alternative artists.

ai_profile:
**Grauzone Festival 2026: A Celebration of Boundless Sonic Explorations**  

Grauzone Festival 2026 brings together a dynamic lineup of 70 artists, showcasing an eclectic mix of genres that push the boundaries of alternative music. Darkwave, post-punk, and electronic sounds dominate the lineup, with notable contributions from techno, synthpop, and industrial acts, creating a rich tapestry of captivating and experimental music. The festival’s dedication to diverse sonic landscapes is evident with niche genres like synthwave, coldwave, and even kosmische and Italo disco making appearances, promising an immersive experience for fans of underground and avant-garde music.  

This year’s lineup reflects a global convergence of talent, with artists hailing from over 17 countries, including France (13 acts), the USA (16 acts across listed variations), the Netherlands (9 acts), and contributions from Japan, Morocco, and Turkey, among others. Grauzone continues its commitment to showcasing diverse voices, with 10 artists identifying as people of color and a balanced representation of gender identities, including female, male, mixed-gender, and non-binary acts.  

With an average artist rating of 8.03 and a majority of performers rated between 8-9, the festival guarantees high-quality performances that resonate with its audience. The inclusion of 11 DJs further amplifies the festival’s pulsating energy, delivering unforgettable sets that blur the lines between genres. Grauzone 2026 is set to be a haven for music lovers who seek innovation, diversity, and boundary-pushing artistry.
